from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from event_manager import *
import time
import sys
import uselect
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

event_manager.reset()

def read_terminal_input():
  spoll=uselect.poll()        # Set up an input polling object.
  spoll.register(sys.stdin, uselect.POLLIN)    # Register polling object.

  input = ''
  if spoll.poll(0):
    input = sys.stdin.read(1)

    while spoll.poll(0):
      input = input + sys.stdin.read(1)

  spoll.unregister(sys.stdin)
  return input

def on_event_timer_callback_y_o_x_l_B():
  global data
  data = read_terminal_input()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(data)
  event_manager.broadcast_message(0)
  event_manager.broadcast_message(0)
  event_manager.broadcast_message(0)
  event_manager.broadcast_message(0)
  event_manager.broadcast_message(0)
  event_manager.broadcast_message(0)

event_manager.add_timer_event(500, on_event_timer_callback_y_o_x_l_B)

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

def on_event_timer_callback_e_A_L_f_l():
  global data
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  print((''.join([str(x) for x in ['!1:T:', aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature(), '#']])))
  print((''.join([str(x2) for x2 in ['!1:H:', aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity(), '#']])))

event_manager.add_timer_event(1000, on_event_timer_callback_e_A_L_f_l)

def on_event_message_callback_y_S_i_o_a():
  global data
  pass

event_manager.add_message_event(0, on_event_message_callback_y_S_i_o_a)

if True:
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Hello')

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
